comment:
Variables:
- \( x \): number of blood tests
- \( y \): number of ear tests

Constraints:
- Time Constraint: \( 30x + 5y \leq 7525 \) (total operating time constraint)
- Blood Test Constraint: \( x \geq 3y \) (at least three times as many blood tests as ear tests)
- Ear Test Constraint: \( y \geq 12 \) (at least 12 ear tests must be administered)

Objective:
- Maximize \( Z = x + y \) (maximize the total number of tests performed)
